site_name: Land At The International Trading Estate
description: Request for Scoping Opinion for demolition of the existing industrial units (totalling 74,332sqm Gross Internal Area (GIA)) on the site; construction of a data centre (across four units totalling 165,826 sqm Gross External Area (GEA) (up to 36m in height); construction of five industrial units for Use Classes B8, B2 and E(g)(iii) (up to 19m in height) in an optimised layout (totalling 38,694 sqm GEA); provision of internal roads, servicing, circulation and car and cycle parking; and associated hard and soft landscaping works (Scoping Opinion under Regulation 15 of the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 (as amended))
